com.ibluetag.indoor.sdk.location

Interface LocationListener


  • public interface LocationListener
    定义位置信息监听者。

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LOCATE_FORCE_FAILURE
      强制定位错误
      static int LOCATE_SUCCESS
      定位成功
      static int LOCATE_UNKNOWN_ERROR
      定位未知错误
